subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Harry Kewell scored for Australia to secure a 1-0 win against visiting Iraq and extend the Socceroos’ lead in Asian qualifying for the 2010 World Cup. Iraq was able to play after FIFA, the world governing body, three days ago “temporarily and conditionally” lifted a one-year ban against the country.
